title: "Predica enters Qatar as Microsoft prepares to open new data centre in Doha"
excerpt: "Microsoft partner Predica has entered the Qatari market as it expects more demand for IT consultancy, ahead of Microsoft unveiling its new data centre in Doha. Economic advances are expected for Qatar through foreign direct investments by international businesses seeking to expand their operations."
